item.title: By: Daniel Reeves
item.dc:creator: Daniel Reeves
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/airbnb/#comment-185434">JMR</a>.
Do you mean Giorgos vs Georgios? Those are just the informal vs formal versions of his name, like Mike vs Michael.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to JMR.

Do you mean Giorgos vs Georgios? Those are just the informal vs formal versions of his name, like Mike vs Michael.

item.title: By: JMR
item.dc:creator: JMR
item.description: great post and best illustration yet. I think your name is misspelled in the by-line, Prof Zervas.
item.content:encoded:
great post and best illustration yet.
I think your name is misspelled in the by-line, Prof Zervas.
